descriptionPoints: Spearheaded the architecture and development of a new cloud-native SaaS platform, resulting in a 30% increase in customer acquisition within the first year.
Led a team of 8 engineers, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement through agile methodologies.
Designed and implemented scalable microservices using Java (Spring Boot) and Node.js, deployed on AWS with Kubernetes.
Drove front-end strategy, championing the adoption of Next.js and TypeScript for enhanced performance and developer experience.
Instituted best practices for code quality, testing (Jest, Cypress), and CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment failures by 40%.
Developed and maintained critical features for a high-traffic e-commerce application, focusing on performance optimization and user experience.
Played a key role in migrating legacy systems to a modern tech stack (React, Node.js, PostgreSQL).
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure adherence to coding standards.
Collaborated closely with product managers and designers to translate requirements into technical solutions.
Implemented robust RESTful APIs and integrated with various third-party services.
Contributed to the development of responsive and accessible web applications for diverse clients.
Gained extensive experience with front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and React.
Worked in an agile environment, participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
Assisted in database design and backend development using Python (Django).
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure software quality and reliability.
Assisted the development team in building and testing new features for a mobile-first web application.
Gained foundational knowledge in web development practices, version control (Git), and software testing.
Participated in UI/UX discussions and contributed to improving the overall user experience.
Learned to work effectively in a fast-paced startup environment.
